decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing a wide range of removal spells, counterspells, and card advantage engines. The deck also includes a variety of multicolored cards to take advantage of Niv-Mizzet Reborn's ability to draw cards and generate value. The inclusion of Bring to Light allows the deck to consistently find key cards, while the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value and flexibility. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's multicolored requirements and ensure consistency in casting spells.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through disruption and removal spells, while gaining advantage through cards like Waste Not and Geier Reach Sanitarium. With a mix of hand disruption, targeted removal, and win conditions like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, and Liliana of the Veil, the deck aims to strip the opponent of resources and overwhelm them with powerful threats. The inclusion of Field of Ruin and Extinction Event also provide additional ways to control the opponent's board state. The deck is designed to grind out games and out value the opponent in the long run.
